data.title: Universities with the Most Nobel Prizes
data.meta_description: Explore the intersection of academic prestige and Nobel laureateship with our interactive tool, mapping Nobel Prize affiliations to universities worldwide from 1901 to 2023. Our database showcases the direct impact of academic institutions on Nobel-winning discoveries and achievements across all categories, including Physics, Chemistry, Medicine, and more. Designed for researchers, students, and academics, our platform allows users to filter data by year, category, and university, providing a unique insight into the educational backgrounds of Nobel laureates. Discover the universities that have fostered innovation and excellence, shaping the minds that have, in turn, shaped our world.
data.text:
*There is a dataset available with all of the data here

**Each university can be clicked to see the selected Nobel Laureates associated with that university (all of which are linked to their wikipedias)
